title: A Night of Negations
report: I have a manic disorder. I also really like to trip. Now that I am on Zyprexa this is interestingly difficult most of the time. I recently attempted to enjoy MDMA. I've done it pre-Zyprexa and liked it a lot. I took the MDMA orally (I'm always on the Zyprexa, 5mg per day). I got some effect, mostly just heightened physical sensations, and an overall feeling of well-being. Unfortunately, about 2 hours later I also had the beginnings of a nasty migraine. To resolve the headache, I smoked about half a gram of primordia (baby psylocibe mushrooms. 10 minutes later the headache was gone. I never did get much more out of the MDMA, but hey - a feeling of well-being isn't a bad thing.

erowid.citation: Anarchistbarbie. "A Night of Negations: experience with MDMA, Olanzapine (Zyprexa), Migraines & Mushrooms (Primdordia) (ID 79802)". Erowid.org. Jul 11, 2009. erowid.org/exp/79802
